io.micronaut.configuration.hibernate.jpa

Class EntityManagerFactoryBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.configuration.hibernate.jpa.EntityManagerFactoryBean

  • @Factory
public class EntityManagerFactoryBean
extends Object
    A factory bean for constructing the EntityManagerFactory.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
